questions.question_text: A hacker searches in Google for filetype:pcf to find Cisco VPN config files. Those files may contain connectivity passwords that can be decoded with which of the following?

choices.A: Defeating the scanner from detecting any code change at the kernel
choices.B: Replacing patch system calls with its own version that hides the rootkit (attacker's) actions
choices.D: Attaching itself to the master boot record in a hard drive and changing the machine's boot sequence/options
choices.C: Performing common services for the application process and replacing real applications with fake ones

questions.question_text: How can a rootkit bypass Windows 7 operating systemâ€™s kernel mode, code signing policy?

discussion.content:
By attaching itself to the master boot record in a hard drive and changing the machines boot sequence/options Windows 7 boot record never has the opportunity to determine something is awry.

https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/how-can-rootkit-bypass-windows-operating-systems-kernel-jameel-nabbo

questions.question_text: Which of the following items of a computer system will an anti-virus program scan for viruses?

discussion.content: yes c is correct along with a

questions.question_text: Which protocol and port number might be needed in order to send log messages to a log analysis tool that resides behind a firewall?

discussion.content:
To send log messages to a log analysis tool behind a firewall, you typically use the Syslog protocol.
UDP 514: This is the default port for Syslog over UDP. It's commonly used because it's lightweight, but it does not guarantee message delivery.

questions.question_text: A pentester is using Metasploit to exploit an FTP server and pivot to a LAN. How will the pentester pivot using Metasploit?

choices.B: Reconfigure the network settings in the meterpreter.
choices.C: Set the payload to propagate through the meterpreter.
choices.A: Issue the pivot exploit and set the meterpreter.
choices.D: Create a route statement in the meterpreter.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
In Metasploit, the route command is used to establish routes for pivoting.
Is D, in the cyberq exams appears this one too.

Selected Answer: C
I think C is the correct answer
